name: Bop-a-mole
description:
This is my first game in Unity. It was inspired by "Section 8: Programming" of the amazing course at https://www.udemy.com/unitycert/learn/v4/overview. Gonna try to keep adding features, and re-implement features that I implemented inefficiently.

Assets:

  • Sounds, music, and bunny models from https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/596
  • Background and clouds from https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/63559
  • "Fish Fingers" font from Brittney Murphy Design, http://brittneymurphydesign.com/

It took 8 hours to create. I have some previous coding experience (mostly in C# and a little in C++). The only Unity experience I had was from doing the Roll-a-Ball tutorial.

Unity ROCKS!

Ben and Sam ROCK!

4/3/2017 Update: Fixed bugs, implemented replay functionality, and used camera viewport to place bunnies in all available screen space.
